about_the_game:
In the Augment Battle System, each fighter can act twice per turn. Use your first move to cast spells or attacks, and use your second move to modify those commands with game-changing Augments!

Augments apply diverse modifiers to your arsenal: Imbue attacks with lightning damage, cast your heals as team-wide spells, and guarantee your buffs trigger before anyone else moves. With millions of Primary-Augment combos available in-game, the sky’s the limit!


Trailthread's story follows a blacksmith, baker, and bandit on their journey to scale Anvite Mountain and slay the bitter Obsidian Drake. Rekindle enchanted forges, meet strange friends, and tumble across the timeline with the mysterious Timestitcher. Can you reach the summit?


Trailthread is a focused 10-hour experience. It features a streamlined world map and quick combat expansion. Enjoy plenty of strategic customization, expressive characters, vibrant music, and more… all in one tight-knit package!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™i5 2.4GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® Geforce® GTX750 or higher, AMD Radeon™ R7 260X or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® Geforce® GTX970 or higher AMD Radeon™ RX 480 or higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Trailthread is a turn-based JRPG where players weave together brand-new attacks each turn. Follow three young adventurers as they scale Anvite Mountain and tumble through time to defeat the Obsidian Drake. Use game-changing Augments to cast dynamic combos and carve your path to the summit!
